description: For centuries, people all around the world have learned discipline, respect, and self-improvement through karate. In Karate, detailed photographs support students' understanding of the basics of this ancient marital art. The book can also be used to teach students how to distinguish fact and opinion and to identify and use conjunctions. The book and lesson are also available for levels I and L.
